MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL63 postcode area of Ty Groes. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8PM due to a fault on our electrical network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:07PM on Sunday 11th April 2021.
